performance-noexcept-move-constructor.description:
Description

The check flags user-defined move constructors and assignment operators not
marked with
noexcept
or marked with
noexcept(expr)
where
expr
evaluates to
false
(but is not a
false
literal itself).

Move constructors of all the types used with STL containers, for example,
should be declared
noexcept
. Otherwise STL may choose copy constructors
instead. The same is valid for move assignment operations.
performance-noexcept-move-constructor.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
